about: Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH), an IPL franchise founded in 2012, represents the city of Hyderabad. Owned by Sun TV Network, SRH quickly established themselves as contenders, winning the IPL title in 2016. Led by David Warner, SRH boasts a strong lineup including Kane Williamson and Rashid Khan. Their aggressive brand of cricket and passionate fan base make them a formidable force in the IPL.
history1: Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH), founded in 2012 as the successor to the Deccan Chargers, quickly made their mark in the Indian Premier League (IPL). Under the astute leadership of captains like Kumar Sangakkara and David Warner, SRH clinched their maiden IPL title in 2016, showcasing a blend of strategic prowess and exceptional talent. Known for their dominant bowling attack led by Rashid Khan, SRH has consistently been a force to be reckoned with in the league.
history2: Throughout their history, SRH has been characterized by a strong team culture, where players like Kane Williamson, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, and Jonny Bairstow have played pivotal roles in their success. Their matches at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium in Hyderabad are marked by electrifying atmospheres as fans, known as the "Orange Army," passionately support their team.
history3: Despite facing challenges and changes in personnel, SRH's resilience and determination have seen them consistently compete at the highest level in the IPL, making them a respected and formidable opponent in the league.
